title: Stop Smoking (Wear support)
summary: Quit smoking and drop it forever with this material design app with animations.
description: Fast and minimalistic material design application with gorgeous material animations whose aim is to help you to quit smoking. It calculates useful statistics and health benefits timetable for you which may help you drop that filthy habit.Anyone interested in translating the app in your native language contact me via email. You will receive a promo code for translating the app.Requirements: Android 4.1+Features:• Material design• Android Wear support• Gorgeous animations and transitions• Dashboard page, which shows you statistics of time not smoking• Health benefits timetable, which shows you your fitness and health improvements during the time not smoking• History page where you will find, what you have sacrificed during the time you have been smoking cigarettes (tobacco)• Large(4x3) and medium(4x2) widget• Option to set your own name and image• Option to choose between metric and imperial units• Date, time and numbers formatted according to your locale• Tiny APK sizePro version includes:• Ad free experience• Light, dark and auto day night themePermissions:• android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE, android.permission.INTERNET (these are for ads)• com.android.vending.BILLING (this is for in-app purchase)Links:• Google+ community• Google+ page• XDA forumCredits:• Stop smoking benefits timetable by WhyQuit.com• Android-Rate by hotchemi• CircleImageView by hdodenhof• AppIntro by Paolo Rotolo• MaterialAbout by MidsizeMango• Material Design Icons by Templarian• Android Asset Studio by Roman Nurik
descriptionHTML:
Fast and minimalistic material design application with gorgeous material animations whose aim is to help you to quit smoking. It calculates useful statistics and health benefits timetable for you which may help you drop that filthy habit.

Anyone interested in translating the app in your native language contact me via email. You will receive a promo code for translating the app.


Requirements: Android 4.1+

Features:
• Material design
• Android Wear support
• Gorgeous animations and transitions
• Dashboard page, which shows you statistics of time not smoking
• Health benefits timetable, which shows you your fitness and health improvements during the time not smoking
• History page where you will find, what you have sacrificed during the time you have been smoking cigarettes (tobacco)
• Large(4x3) and medium(4x2) widget
• Option to set your own name and image
• Option to choose between metric and imperial units
• Date, time and numbers formatted according to your locale
• Tiny APK size

Pro version includes:
• Ad free experience
• Light, dark and auto day night theme


Permissions:
• android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE, android.permission.INTERNET (these are for ads)
• com.android.vending.BILLING (this is for in-app purchase)


Links:
• Google+ community
• Google+ page
• XDA forum

comments: Great app! The app is very well designed and works great. The dev reached out to me to fix the counter issue I was having. They fixed it the same day. I will recommend this app to every smoker I know.
Beautiful app Beautiful app. I love the look and feel. Crashes all the time
Ok Doesn't register the dates I input for some reason, note 5. Uninstalled
Awesome app for ppl who are trying to quit smoking..
